item.description:
The Harry Potter Exhibit at the Museum of Science ends Feb 28th so I'm planning a last minute outing to this.
Anyone who missed it the first time NerdFun had an outing, hopefully you can come to this one.
Details about the exhibit may be found here.
http://www.mos.org/ex...

Please buy tickets around 4:15 pm. If we buy tickets around the same time, we can meet up at the Museum.
Tickets are $26.

I'm buying my ticket for 4:25 pm so I can meet you all if anyone is late.
My name is Zahra. I'll be in the Museum lobby 4 pm with a Meetup sign. I'm 5'5" and I always wear a hat and glasses and a silver messenger bag.

See you soon!
item.name: Harry Potter Exhibit at Museum of Science - Feb 20
